Package game.items.seeds

Class Seed

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.items.seeds.Seed
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, Plantable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BloodroseSeed, InheritreeSeed
public abstract class Seed extends Item implements Plantable
Abstract base class for plantable seeds. Defines common planting logic.

  • Method Details

    • allowableActions

      public ActionList allowableActions(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Determines the actions that can be performed with this seed by the given actor. If the actor is standing on a valid ground tile (e.g., soil) and has sufficient stamina, the seed can be planted.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class Item
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor holding the seed.
      map - The game map where the actor is located.
      Returns:
      A list of allowable actions for this seed.

    • plantAt

      public abstract String plantAt(Location here, Actor farmer)
      Plants the Seed at the specified location and performs the specific seed's effect.
      Specified by:
      plantAt in interface Plantable
      Parameters:
      here - The location where the seed is planted.
      farmer - The actor planting the seed.
      Returns:
      A string describing the planting action.
